DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare subjective performance DAILIES TOTAL1® daily disposable contact lenses 1-DAY ACUVUE® TruEye® daily disposable contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Two Daily Disposable Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Sign write Informed Consent Document HIPAA form . Be current weekly/monthly replacement contact lens wearer . Be willing sleep contact lenses study period . Require vision correction eye , contact lens prescription protocolspecified power range . Have best correct visual acuity least 20/25 eye . Be willing wear study lenses least 8 hours/day least 5 days/week . Use rewetting drop less per day willing discontinue use rewetting drop wear study contact lens . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Be neophyte current wearer daily disposable lens . Require monovision correction use multifocal contact lens . Have systemic ocular disease disorder , complicate factor , structural abnormality would negatively affect conduct outcome study . Have history ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month . Use topical ocular systemic antibiotic within 7 day enrollment . Use topical ocular systemic corticosteroid within 14 day enrollment , continue throughout study . Have participate ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment . Have habitually wear contact lenses extend wear basis ( sleep habitual contact lenses least 2 night per week ) last 3 month prior enrollment . Use rewetting drop per day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
